mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO hs_app_order( id, channelId, ckChannelId, ckAppId, mmAppId, imei, imsi, isOnline, appId, fee, paystatus, orderId, HsOrderId, ackType, payCount, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{channelId}, #{ckChannelId}, #{ckAppId}, #{mmAppId}, #{imei}, #{imsi}, #{isOnline}, #{appId}, #{fee}, #{paystatus}, #{tradeId}, #{orderid}, #{ackType}, #{payCount}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
